description: Ministry of City Planning and Water Supply - Order to approve the acquisition of immovable properties in Kobbewela and Bisowela in Galigamuwa D/S Division, Kegalle District for the constructions under the Galigamuwa Water Supply Scheme in Vattappalai, Muhudubadapattuwa D/S Division, Mullaitivu District for the constructions under Mullaitivu Water Supply Project
